if anyones interested dm me I will sell them cheap

If anyone is selling a ds (any model) dm me
if anyone is selling a dmg front board with a intact screen message me

https://imgur.com/a/Rk0WaZ6
Tracking automatic within Canada, add a little bit if in the USA (unsure on price)
$100 CAD shipped within North America
Has a normal backlight, a little uneven so I think it needs a 5v voltage regulator
Contrast wheel feels a little firm, unsure if that's an underlying issue for anything
Contrast might be flickering, but i'm not sure.
glass screen
OEM NES Buttons
authentic PIL back board and shell, insanely good shape other than the ding at the bottom (see pics)
havent tested dc charging/link port because i dont have the cables
could use a new back polarizer or a re-adjustment, white light from the backlight peeks out on the left (see pics)
wasn't able to get this to the condition i wanted, so I'm  asking for approx how much i paid.
TL;DR could use some tweaking to make it perfect but overall is usable.
Probably an extreme long shot, but I WTB a lime green battery cover for AGS-001.  Either from the Target exclusive DK version AGS 001 or the Toys R Us Shrek model.
Pokémon silver German edition €15 including international shipping

<:WTS:708489317168971778> brightness boards for Funnyplaying SP IPS. This board saves your brightness level by recording the brightness button presses, and playing them back when you turn the console on. $10 shipped in the US.

More stuff WTS. NOTE THE 3 POKEMOM BOXES ARE REPRODUCTIONS. The carts inside them are 100% authentic though and so is everything else here including the CIB GBA games. Harvest moon is opened but it still has original shrink wrap it’s just cut at the top. Three SP of the good transparent SP shells in green, orange, and atomic purple.
<:WTB:708489317357584415> DMG LCD/LCD Board (not IPS)
